title: Noah's Little Portfolio Website
subtitle: There's a couple of writeups here for projects I've messed with

interactiveArea.title: Hello!
interactiveArea.description: Explore my work and projects, interact with graphics, and learn more about what I do.

aboutMe.title: About Me
content: I’m a **creative developer** with a passion for building beautiful, functional digital experiences. My work is driven by a commitment to **innovation**, **elegance**, and **user-centric design**.

With a background in both design and development, I bridge the gap between aesthetics and functionality. Whether it’s a sleek web app or a robust backend system, I strive for excellence in every detail.
Let’s collaborate and bring your vision to life!

items.title: Artify: Digital Art Marketplace
items.description: A platform for artists to showcase and sell their work. Built with **Next.js** and **Stripe** integration.

items.title: HealthTrack: Fitness Tracker
items.description: A mobile-first fitness app that tracks workouts, nutrition, and progress. Built with **React Native** and **Firebase**.

items.title: CodeCraft: Developer Tools
items.description: A suite of tools for developers, including a code formatter and API tester. Built with **Electron** and **TypeScript**.
